  function loading.readDataForAllWads(i32, i32) -> ()
  function runtimeControl.getTicksMs() -> (i64)
  function ui.drawFrame(i32) -> ()

  function initGame() -> ()
  function reportKeyDown(i32) -> ()
  function reportKeyUp(i32) -> ()
  function tickGame() -> ()
